item.title: Data Analysis Worrying - Part 2
item.description: This blogpost is about solutions to tackle constant “data analysis worrying”. Part 1 discussed a mental coping approach, while Part 2 will show more technical solutions and prevention techniques. Let’s dive right in! 1. Work organisation Write code such that mistakes can be corrected and analysis rerun easily. The reasoning: this allows you to be at ease and not afraid of mistakes. Mistakes will happen to the greatest data analysts, but if you have a code/computing environment set up where you can quickly make a change to a code snippet written 2 months ago, and rerun the analysis, then you won’t fear mistakes.
